QuestData.Title: A Little Brain Work
QuestData.Description: Far to the south, the swarm breeds weapons of destruction - enormous, nearly unbreakable amber scorpions.$B$BLike all other creatures, they are subject to manipulation, but unlike other creatures, they have not yet submitted to my mind control.$B$BIt appears that further research is necessary before I can dominate them for our own purposes.$B$BI must study their brains, and you must retrieve some specimens for me.$B$BTake this sonic emitter. I have found it to be quite effective against the beasts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Amber-Encrusted Brains from Ik'thik Amberstingers.
